short.ko: "크롬 확장 프로그램으로 Moto X3M의 쾌감을 경험해보세요 - 지금 바로 시도해보세요!"

short.vi: Trải nghiệm cảm giác hồi hộp của Moto X3M như là một tiện ích mở rộng Chrome - Hãy thử ngay bây giờ!
short.zh_CN: 体验 Moto X3M 的刺激，作为 Chrome 扩展程序 - 立即尝试！
short.zh_TW: Experience the thrill of Moto X3M as a Chrome extension - 立即嘗試！

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Moto X3M is the ultimate adrenaline-fueled motorcycle racing game that will push your skills to the limit! Get ready to conquer challenging terrains, perform insane stunts, and race against the clock in this action-packed adventure.

How to Play:
Controls: Use the arrow keys to accelerate, brake, and balance your motorcycle.
Race Against Time: Complete each level as quickly as possible to earn the highest star rating.
Perform Stunts: Use ramps and obstacles to perform jaw-dropping stunts and earn bonus points.
Avoid Hazards: Watch out for obstacles, traps, and hazards that can slow you down or cause you to crash.
Unlock New Levels: Progress through the game to unlock new levels and challenges with even more thrilling obstacles.

Tips and Tricks:
Master Your Balance: Practice maintaining balance on your motorcycle to navigate through tricky obstacles and terrain.
Time Your Jumps: Time your jumps carefully to avoid obstacles and perform perfectly timed stunts for maximum points.
Use Momentum: Use the momentum from downhill sections to gain speed and momentum for uphill climbs.
Experiment with Different Routes: Explore different routes and paths to find the fastest way to the finish line.
Upgrade Your Motorcycle: Earn stars and coins to upgrade your motorcycle with better performance and handling.

Play more games on the top-left menu.
